actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 264(b) of title 10, United States Code, to prohibit the transfer or expenditure of reserve component funds for purposes other than for which appropriated.

summary.text: Prohibits funds appropriated for personnel, supplies, equipment, and facilities for a reserve component of the Armed Forces from being transferred or expended for any other purpose. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 264 (b))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 264(b) of title 10, United States Code, to prohibit the transfer or expenditure of reserve component funds for purposes other than for which appropriated.
